content.position: Senior Software Engineer, NovaTech Solutions
items: Led development of a cloud-native microservices architecture using Kubernetes and AWS, reducing deployment times by 40%.
Designed and implemented a real-time data processing pipeline with Apache Kafka, handling over 1M transactions daily.
Mentored a team of 5 junior engineers, establishing best practices for code reviews and CI/CD pipelines.
Developed a machine learning-based recommendation engine using Python and TensorFlow, improving user engagement by 25%.
Optimized SQL queries and database schemas in PostgreSQL, reducing query execution time by 60%.
Contributed to open-source project QueryFast, adding support for parallel query execution.
Built responsive web applications using React and Node.js, serving over 10,000 monthly active users.
Automated testing workflows with Jest and Selenium, increasing test coverage by 30%.
Collaborated with UX designers to implement accessible UI components compliant with WCAG 2.1 standards.
Assisted in developing a RESTful API using Flask and Python, integrating with third-party payment gateways.
Wrote documentation for internal tools, improving onboarding time for new developers by 20%.
BS Computer Science
Graduated with Honors, GPA: 3.8/4.0
President of the Tech Club
Programming Languages: Python, JavaScript, Java, SQL
Frameworks and Tools: React, Node.js, Django, Kubernetes, AWS
Certifications: AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
Experienced with Git, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions
Developed a task management CLI tool in Python, with over 500 stars on GitHub.
Contributed to DataViz, adding interactive chart features using D3.js.
Avid rock climber and member of the Techville Climbing Club
Volunteer mentor for CodeForGirls, teaching coding to young women
Amateur photographer, with work featured on PhotoHub
